BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 140259Z JUL
   BY M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT
   3.5 MILE LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-07.13S 042-11.87W, 24-25.77S 042-01.50W,
   24-43.58S 041-52.42W, 24-51.18S 041-41.38W,
   24-12.75S 042-03.15W, 24-00.37S 042-10.02W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 140359Z JUL.
